data.actual_result: You are taken to the top channel of the Server, this happens to all of your other Servers (for example instead of bug-approval-queue you're in rules).
data.expected_result: You are in the last channel you've visited (in the Bug Hunters Server for example bug-approval-queue).
data.short_description: Clicking on a notification will take you to the top channel of every Server.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone to send you a message and click on the notification; you have to close the app from the Android button first and make sure you weren't in the Server where you got the notification. - Switch Server and observe the channel, watch the video for any clarification.
